channel.title: Redux on Kyk's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Redux on Kyk's Blog

item.title: Redux Typescript
item.description: There are two library for redux, redux-toolkit create a slice for reducer, action = reducer key name reduxsauce normal createActions, createReducer I recommend redux-toolkit, because it has better support for typescript. It restrict PayloadAction<SOMETHING> for action creator and reducer. But the downside is action must be binded to reducer. Must need to create new action for dispatch two actions.
